I believe by being mediocre yes, we can match SG and HK but I dunno about China and Taiwan, never work there b4.But I can tell you about HK. I work there very frequently. I used to coordinate work with a lot of HK management trainees who have exceptional results and are posted overseas to lead local offices because of their so-called proficiency. Some of them are so stupid and ridiculously egoistical, childlish to the max, that they cause the local office to lose money. Yet the idiotic head office still give them another chance. I also seen HK bosses in HK think like a couple of idiots too. The decisions they make are ludicrious. That is why I believe, if we all work on mediocre status we can easily catch up to HK. But unfortunately most of us dun work mediocre. Most of us are below par.
